1550.author: undefined
1550.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

1792.author: lauritz
1792.message: Adapted the update behavior on ticks. Reduces the impact of HTML's autoscroll to selected list items.

1980.comment: Edit scripts and connections of a morph. Enter braces on the iPad more quickly by using buttons for it.

1983.author: robertkrahn
1983.message: - Tags text morph now is a input line, fixed a bug in generateSourceForScript()

2001.author: bsiegmund
2001.message: Run Button now moving when window is resized

2007.author: lauritz
2007.message: fixed a bug (onBlur event handling) and added the world to the target chooser

2011.author: lauritz
2011.message: Refactoring of script annotations (now at scripts not morphs). Added category tagging. Layout changes.

2015.author: lauritz
2015.message: two more checks on attempts to remove scripts or connections.

2017.author: lauritz
2017.message: added confirmation before removal of scripts or connections.

2019.author: lauritz
2019.message: Adapted the update behavior on ticks. Reduces the impact of HTML's autoscroll to selected list items.

2021.author: lauritz
2021.message: Locked down submorphs of the editor pane. Grabbing and dragging disabled.

2029.author: lauritz
2029.message: removed a missed debugger statement. corrected setting of target.

2031.author: lauritz
2031.message: added a border to notifications, centered notification text

2035.author: lauritz
2035.message: fixed a defect (weeeeeird property caused an error on deserialization of copies)

2037.author: lauritz
2037.message: fixed a bug regarding anonymous morphs.

2039.author: lauritz
2039.message: workaround for issue #161 - target morph list is scrollable

2043.author: lauritz
2043.message: tries to get user directly from localStorage now. if there's no user set, then we don't call CGI - logging into trac should not be necessary for developing parts.

2047.author: lauritz
2047.message: top-most entry of the tag list is "all" now.

2051.author: robertkrahn
2051.message: show scripts even if they are wrapped
